title: Battle of Iwo Jima
summary: The Battle of Iwo Jima (19 February â€“ 26 March 1945) was a major battle in which the United States Marine Corps and Navy landed on and eventually captured the island of Iwo Jima from the Imperial Japanese Army (IJA) during World War II.  The American invasion, designated Operation Detachment, had the purpose of capturing the island with its two airfields: South Field and Central Field.
